description:
P2PEscrow.transferMinusFees(address,uint256,uint256) (contracts/P2P.sol#234-243) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}() (contracts/P2P.sol#241)
markdown:
[P2PEscrow.transferMinusFees(address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/P2P.sol#L234-L243) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [(sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}()](contracts/P2P.sol#L241)

description:
P2PEscrow.setFees(uint8) (contracts/P2P.sol#339-343) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool,string)(_fees < 10000,Fees must be less than 10000) (contracts/P2P.sol#340)
markdown:
[P2PEscrow.setFees(uint8)](contracts/P2P.sol#L339-L343) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- [require(bool,string)(_fees < 10000,Fees must be less than 10000)](contracts/P2P.sol#L340)

description:
P2PEscrow.setOwner(address)._newOwner (contracts/P2P.sol#331) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _newOwner (contracts/P2P.sol#333)

Reentrancy in P2PEscrow.executeOrder(bytes32,address,bytes) (contracts/P2P.sol#164-187):
	External calls:
	- transferMinusFees(address(_escrow.buyer),_escrow.value,fees) (contracts/P2P.sol#185)
		- (sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}() (contracts/P2P.sol#241)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TradeCompleted(_tradeID) (contracts/P2P.sol#186)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [P2PEscrow.executeOrder(bytes32,address,bytes)](contracts/P2P.sol#L164-L187):
	External calls:
	- [transferMinusFees(address(_escrow.buyer),_escrow.value,fees)](contracts/P2P.sol#L185)
		- [(sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}()](contracts/P2P.sol#L241)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TradeCompleted(_tradeID)](contracts/P2P.sol#L186)

description:
Reentrancy in P2PEscrow.withdrawFees(address,uint256) (contracts/P2P.sol#304-317):
	External calls:
	- (sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_amount)}() (contracts/P2P.sol#314)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- FeeWithdrawn(_to,_amount) (contracts/P2P.sol#316)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [P2PEscrow.withdrawFees(address,uint256)](contracts/P2P.sol#L304-L317):
	External calls:
	- [(sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_amount)}()](contracts/P2P.sol#L314)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [FeeWithdrawn(_to,_amount)](contracts/P2P.sol#L316)

description:
Reentrancy in P2PEscrow.claimDisputedOrder(bytes32,bytes) (contracts/P2P.sol#140-158):
	External calls:
	- transferMinusFees(address(msg.sender),_escrow.value,fees) (contracts/P2P.sol#156)
		- (sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}() (contracts/P2P.sol#241)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- DisputeClaimed(_tradeID) (contracts/P2P.sol#157)

		- [(sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}()](contracts/P2P.sol#L241)

description:
Different versions of Solidity are used:
	- Version used: ['^0.8.18', '^0.8.20']
	- ^0.8.18 (contracts/Signature.sol#2)
	- ^0.8.20 (contracts/P2P.sol#15)
markdown:
Different versions of Solidity are used:
	- Version used: ['^0.8.18', '^0.8.20']
	- [^0.8.18](contracts/Signature.sol#L2)
	- [^0.8.20](contracts/P2P.sol#L15)

description: Pragma version^0.8.20 (contracts/P2P.sol#15) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.8.18.
markdown: Pragma version[^0.8.20](contracts/P2P.sol#L15) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.8.18.

description: solc-0.8.20 is not recommended for deployment
markdown: solc-0.8.20 is not recommended for deployment
